metadata.name: SAMURAI
metadata.description: Kenshin was a legendary samurai known for his courage and skill with the sword. He fought for justice, protecting the innocent and always adhering to the code of the samurai. Kenshin was renowned for his lightning-fast strikes and precise movements, and was greatly respected by his fellow samurai. He was also known for his humility, always striving to improve himself and help others. To this day, Kenshin's legacy lives on as a symbol of bravery and honor.
